ingredients: Optional: 1 Tbsp olive oil for sauteing
2 medium tomatoes, diced (or 1 can diced tomatoes, 14 oz)
steps: (Optional) Saute onion and garlic in olive oil in Instant Pot on saute mode for 2-3 minutes
Add lentils, tomatoes, chipotle peppers, adobo sauce, oregano, and broth
Cook on high pressure for 10 minutes
Natural release for 10 minutes, then quick release remaining pressure
Season with salt to taste. If mixture is too liquid, use saute mode to reduce for a few minutes
title: Lentil Tinga-Style Filling
